bibl.title: Report under Oath to Apollonios the Strategos: P.CtYBR inv. 4079.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: P.CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4079 = P. Bagnall 32. Location written: Ἰβιὼν Πανεκτύρεως; location of addressee: Apollonopolis?; location found: Hermopolis, 1902. Ca. 116/117.
bibl.seg: Ann Ellis Hanson, Report under Oath to Apollonios the Strategos: P.CtYBR inv. 4079.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 133-139, 1 fig.
P.CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4079 = P. Bagnall 32. Location written: Ἰβιὼν Πανεκτύρεως; location of addressee: Apollonopolis?; location found: Hermopolis, 1902. Ca. 116/117.
